backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two UI text and alignment changes tied to BenefitsSection.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for build/reference purposes.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide for deploying the site to IC mainnet and verifying required gallery assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH design tokens, dark mode variables, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata, favicon, fonts, and root mount for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing header and all site sections in order.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Empty footer file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive fixed header with smooth-scroll navigation, logo, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutCa: Section displaying four capability cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Benefit: Benefits grid showing four advantages with icons, centered titles, and justified descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Collect: Renders a collections grid with randomized thumbnails and static data for carpet categories. Uses useMemo to choose a stable random image per collection.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact cards (phone, email, location) and CTA buttons using shared CONTACT config. Provides call, email, and visit actions with styled UI components.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Implements a gallery with category filtering, modal previews, and error handling for images. Precomputes asset URLs and manages selected image state.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with a background image, headline, and buttons that smooth-scroll to gallery and contact sections. Uses Tailwind for layout and styling.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Exports constant CONTACT object containing phone, email, and location details including map URLs. Serves as the single source of truth for site contact info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity authentication using React Query. Recreates and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, identity persistence, and state management. Wraps AuthClient with custom initialization and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for a warm color palette with light and dark mode variants. Adds global font, spacing, and utility adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrapped around App. Imports global styles and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Utility to build encoded asset URLs by cleaning and encoding path segments and applying the Vite base URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins such as typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking feature changes, requests, metadata, and current update tasks for benefits card text and alignment.
